properties.name: app.allowed.origins
properties.description: A comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS requests.

properties.name: app.security.localhost.ipv4
properties.description: The IPv4 address of the localhost allowed for security purposes.

properties.name: app.security.localhost.ipv6
properties.description: The IPv6 address of the localhost allowed for security purposes.

properties.name: app.security.error.message
properties.description: The error message returned when a request is not from an allowed localhost address.
